title: New Kuat Piston Pro X Hitch Rack gets Kashima Coat, OneTap Hydro Arms & LED Lights!
content:
Genuine Kashima Coat is probably not something you thought your bike rack needed. But the new Kuat Piston Pro X is not your average hitch rack. Building off their incredibly successful line of hitch racks, Kuat just dropped what could be the most exiting rack yet — the new Piston Pro X. There’s a lot […]

The post New Kuat Piston Pro X Hitch Rack gets Kashima Coat, OneTap Hydro Arms & LED Lights! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
